org.restsql.core

Interface TableMetaData

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TableMetaDataImpl

    public interface TableMetaData
    Encapsulates table information for an SQL Resource.
    Author:
    Mark Sawers
    See Also:
    SqlResource, ColumnMetaData

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  TableMetaData.TableRole
      Represents all of the roles a table may plan in a SQL Resource.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,ColumnMetaData> getColumns()
      Returns map of column meta data, keyed by the column label (the alias if provided, otherwise the name).
      String getDatabaseName()
      Returns database name.
      List<ColumnMetaData> getPrimaryKeys()
      Returns ordered list of columns that are primary keys.
      String getQualifiedTableName()
      Returns fully qualified table name in database-specific form for use in SQL statements.
      String getTableAlias()
      Returns table alias.
      String getTableName()
      Returns table name.
      TableMetaData.TableRole getTableRole()
      Returns role of table in the SQL Resource.
      boolean isChild()
      Returns true if the SQL Resource role is child.
      boolean isParent()
      Returns true if the SQL Resource role is parent.

    • Method Detail

      • getColumns

        Map<String,ColumnMetaData> getColumns()
        Returns map of column meta data, keyed by the column label (the alias if provided, otherwise the name).

      • getDatabaseName

        String getDatabaseName()
        Returns database name.

      • getPrimaryKeys

        List<ColumnMetaData> getPrimaryKeys()
        Returns ordered list of columns that are primary keys.

      • getQualifiedTableName

        String getQualifiedTableName()
        Returns fully qualified table name in database-specific form for use in SQL statements. MySQL uses the form database.table, for example sakila.film. PostgreSQL uses the form database.schema.table, for example sakila.public.film.

      • getTableAlias

        String getTableAlias()
        Returns table alias.

      • getTableName

        String getTableName()
        Returns table name.

      • getTableRole

        TableMetaData.TableRole getTableRole()
        Returns role of table in the SQL Resource.

      • isChild

        boolean isChild()
        Returns true if the SQL Resource role is child.

      • isParent

        boolean isParent()
        Returns true if the SQL Resource role is parent.
